CustomField.description: Specifies which Contacts will have Households objects automatically created for them. Note that this is only used for Contacts using the One-to-One or Individual Account Model. This is ignored for Contacts with the Household Account Model.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specifies which Contacts will have Households objects automatically created for them. Note that this is only used for Contacts using the One-to-One or Individual Account Model. This is ignored for Contacts with the Household Account Model.
CustomField.label: Household Object Rules
